21.name: 2× Scope
21.effect: Clean glass, light frame for mid-range

28.name: Red Dot
28.effect: Fast CQB target acquisition, no zoom

30.name: Double Barrel
30.effect: Fires two projectiles; 2× ammo; up to 140% dmg if both hit

39.name: Suppressor
39.effect: Quieter shots, less flash, small recoil cut

44.name: Dash
44.effect: C key dash; 8 s cooldown; up to 3 charges

112b.name: Insight
112b.effect: Outline enemies you hit for 3 s

116.name: Pull
116.effect: Bullets pull victims ~3 m toward you

59.name: Battlecry
59.effect: Shout: +25% damage & -30% taken for 6 s (self + allies)

64.name: Healing Words
64.effect: Speak to AOE-heal 30 HP (12 s CD)

68.name: Lit Beats
68.effect: On-beat shots +30% dmg, no recoil for beat window

77.name: Stormcall
77.effect: Spawn 10 m storm for 8 s (12 dmg/s to enemies)

80.name: Vampire
80.effect: Heal 50% missing HP + 15 instant HP on kill

82.name: Words of Justice
82.effect: Speak: allies +25 armour; you +15% ROF for 10 s

127.name: Assassin
127.effect: After 4 s stealth: next headshot +100% dmg

83.name: Battlecry
83.effect: Shout: +40% damage & -40% taken for 8 s (40 s CD)

86.name: Charge
86.effect: +60% movespeed & slow immunity for 8 s after shout

87.name: Dash
87.effect: 1.5 s cooldown; infinite charges while airborne

90.name: Ice
90.effect: First hit every 5 s freezes solid for 1 s

92.name: Lit Beats
92.effect: On-beat shots deal 2× dmg & ricochet once

99.name: Spray
99.effect: +60% fire-rate; bullets cost half ammo (rounded up)

100.name: Stormcall
100.effect: Personal lightning storm 12 s (20 dmg/s + vehicle EMP)

102.name: Hunt
102.effect: On kill: full heal + 5 s wall-hack of victim's squad

103.name: Vampire
103.effect: On kill: full heal + 30% lifesteal for 5 s

105.name: Words of Justice
105.effect: Shout: allies +50% ROF & +50% dmg & -50% recoil for 8 s

264.name: Beretta 93R
264.effect: Burst-fire machine-pistol (3-shot) with 20-round mag; very steady hip-spray.

265.name: Crossbow Pistol
265.effect: One-handed mini-crossbow; single bolt, slow reload, can be dual-wielded.

266.name: Desert Eagle
266.effect: Heavy-hitting semi-auto; 8 Normal rounds, big kick.

267.name: Flintlock
267.effect: Single-shot black-powder pistol; huge damage, very slow reload.

268.name: Taser Flintlock
268.effect: Single stun round; ragdolls for a few seconds; slow reload.

269.name: Auto Revolver
269.effect: Six-shot revolver that can full-auto; built-in red dot.

270.name: Wind-Up Pistol
270.effect: Stores up to 11 rounds; fires two bullets per pull after winding.

271.name: Glock (G18c)
271.effect: Fully automatic 25-round machine-pistol; low recoil at point-blank.

272.name: Glue Gun
272.effect: Shoots sticky blobs to pin/slow foes; Glock-like baseline.

273.name: Hand Gun
273.effect: Rubber hand firing seven shots; M1911-like damage; comedy SFX.

274.name: Hand Cannon
274.effect: Pocket cannon lobbing a single explosive ball; slow reload.

275.name: Liberating M1911
275.effect: Dual-wields by default; 15-round mags, full-auto only, faster ROF.

276.name: Luger P08
276.effect: Eight-round semi-auto with very low recoil; toggle lock blocks sights briefly.

277.name: M1911
277.effect: Classic seven-round sidearm; balanced damage, quick reload.

278.name: Real Gun
278.effect: Joke revolver with a “BANG!” flag; zero damage.

279.name: Really Big Deagle
279.effect: Upscaled Deagle; eight .50 rounds for 104-dmg headshots; wild recoil.

280.name: Revolver
280.effect: Six-shot Python analogue; fast fan-fire; strong knock-back.

281.name: Holy Revolver
281.effect: Halo variant of Revolver; identical ballistics.

282.name: Reverse Revolver
282.effect: Bent 180°—shoots backwards; slapstick self-damage or heal synergy.

283.name: Hardballer
283.effect: Suppressed silver 1911; spawns in pairs; slightly higher damage.

284.name: Taser
284.effect: Single-shot stun pistol; ragdolls target ~4 s.

302.name: AKS-74U
302.effect: 30-round carbine; brisk ROF, moderate recoil; great short–mid.

304.name: Money Mac
304.effect: Bling Mac-10; 32-round mag, lightning ROF; cash blocks sight a bit.

305.name: Glockinator
305.effect: Two extended-mag Glocks bolted; fires two per click from a 50-drum.

306.name: Liberating Thompson
306.effect: Dual-wieldable star-spangled Thompson; 30 rounds, fast ROF.

308.name: Mac-10
308.effect: 32-round pocket hose; wild hip-fire; best at point-blank.

309.name: MP-40
309.effect: WWII SMG; slower cadence, predictable recoil for mid taps.

310.name: MP5-K
310.effect: Compact 20-rounder; fast cyclic rate, mild recoil.

311.name: P90
311.effect: 50-round top-loader; very high ROF; great room clearer.

312.name: PPSH-41
312.effect: 71-round drum; blistering fire-rate; overwhelming up close.

313.name: Tec-9
313.effect: 32-round; semi/full-auto modes; acts like an SMG.

315.name: Vector
315.effect: Selectable burst/full-auto; ultra-fast ROF; low recoil.

151.name: AK-2K47
151.effect: Futuristic AK; 40-round mag; trades damage for volume; semi/full-auto.

153.name: AUG
153.effect: Bullpup with fixed 2× optic; high ROF, great accuracy.

154.name: Beam-AR
154.effect: 60-round 'laser' rifle; continuous 6-shot bursts; no recoil; beefy last beam.

155.name: Burstgun
155.effect: Empties entire 30-round mag in one burst; monstrous DPS, heavy recoil.

156.name: Famas
156.effect: Fast three-round bursts; controllable climb; close–mid shredder.

157.name: Cursed Famas
157.effect: Bullets yank enemies toward you; base Famas stats otherwise.

158.name: H1
158.effect: Auto-burst rifle; rapid 2-shot bursts; low recoil; light-blue tracers.

159.name: Liberating M16
159.effect: Patriotic M16; dual-wieldable; full-auto only; lower hip recoil.

160.name: M16
160.effect: 30-round; selectable 3-round burst or semi; moderate recoil.

161.name: MP-44
161.effect: StG-44 clone; slow-firing, hard-hitting; rewards paced shots.

162.name: SCAR-H
162.effect: 25-round heavy; chunky per-shot damage; minimal drop.

163.name: Auto Crossbow
163.effect: 14-bolt mag; steady full-auto stream; long reload.

164.name: Balloon Crossbow
164.effect: Helium bolts strap balloons to enemies; crowd control.

169.name: Crossbow
169.effect: Single-shot; ~130 torso; bolt drop; one-bolt reload.

170.name: Taser Crossbow
170.effect: Stun bolt per reload; ragdolls ~4 s on direct hit.

171.name: Firework Crossbow
171.effect: Ten-bolt mag sticks fireworks; low damage, big knock-up.

172.name: Gaussbow
172.effect: Explosive gauss bolt; slow 1-bolt reload; brutal splash.

174.name: Harpoon
174.effect: Latches and drags enemies toward you.

184.name: The Promise
184.effect: Beefed-up Gaussbow; detonation after ~30 s or on impact; huge blast.

165.name: Boss Weapon Full Auto
165.effect: AK-style bossgun; yellow triangle rounds; 30-round mag.

166.name: Boss Weapon Grenade Launcher
166.effect: Bossgun variant; lobs MGL grenades; savage area damage.

180.name: Money Stack
180.effect: “Makes it rain” 50 cash bills; zero damage; burns Money ammo fast.

185.name: Water Gun
185.effect: 100-shot super-soaker; heavy drop; goofy close-range knock-back.

285.name: Beam DMR
285.effect: Sci-fi burst rifle firing rapid 6-shot light-beam volleys from a 60-round pool; zero drop, ammo-hungry.

286.name: FAL
286.effect: 20-round semi-auto battle rifle; crisp taps for mid–long range.

287.name: Garand
287.effect: Iconic 8-shot clip with the 'ping'; big hits, modest recoil.

288.name: Liberating Garand
288.effect: Patriotic Garand; can go full-auto or dual-wield; faster reloads.

289.name: M14
289.effect: 25-round semi-auto; fast follow-ups, low drop; consistent all-range.

290.name: S7
290.effect: Four-shot burst marksman with 20-round mag; sprays tight clusters.

291.name: Winchester Model 1886
291.effect: Lever-action repeater; 9 big rounds; hard-hitting, minimal drop.

303.name: AWPS-74U
303.effect: Hybrid AWP/AKS: 30-round Big-Ammo, very low recoil, respectable auto-rate.

317.name: AWP
317.effect: Bolt-action heavy hitter; 10 big rounds; OS headshots; slow cycle.

318.name: Taser AWP
318.effect: Stun AWP; 10 taser rounds that ragdoll ~4 s.

319.name: Barrett
319.effect: Semi-auto .50; 10-round mag; fast follow-ups, big knock-back.

320.name: Beam Sniper
320.effect: 10-beam bursts from a 60-round pool; last beam hits hardest; zero drop.

321.name: Kar98
321.effect: Five-round bolt; lethal on head; slightly easier handling than AWP.

322.name: Liberating Barrett
322.effect: Patriotic Barrett with extra knock-back; dual-wieldable chaos.

323.name: Musket
323.effect: Single-shot muzzle-loader; colossal damage; slow reload, big drop.

324.name: Taser Musket
324.effect: One taser ball; direct hit ragdolls ~6 s.

325.name: Really Big Barrett
325.effect: Supersized Barrett; devastating damage with comic knock-back.

326.name: Sniper Shotgun
326.effect: Slug cannon; pellets gain damage over distance; surprises at range.

327.name: Two Shot
327.effect: Queues two perfectly-grouped shots per trigger; no recoil; 8-round mag.

328.name: VSS
328.effect: Integrally-suppressed; high ROF, sub-sonic Small-Ammo; low recoil.

292.name: AA-12
292.effect: Full-auto; up to 15 shells; 7 pellets per shot; shreds point-blank.

293.name: Blunderbuss
293.effect: Single-shot black-powder scatter; 8 hefty pellets; huge knock-back.

294.name: Sawed-Off Shotgun
294.effect: One-handed double-barrel; brutal point-blank; ragdolls shooter & target.

295.name: Flying Blunderbuss
295.effect: Half the fire-rate, tighter spread; recoil launches the user.

296.name: Liberating AA-12
296.effect: Dual-wield AA-12s; 20-shell mags; faster reloads; wider cone.

297.name: Mossberg 500
297.effect: Pump-action; 5 shells; 9 pellets at ~13 dmg each; reliable CQB.

298.name: Mossberg 5000
298.effect: Ricocheting pellets let you bank shots around corners; 5-shell tube.

299.name: Taser Mossberg
299.effect: Stun pellets; ~2 s incapacitation; high spread & drop.

300.name: Rainmaker
300.effect: Burst-only auto shotgun; 15-shell mag; five low-dmg pellets per shot in an arc.

301.name: Arnold
301.effect: One-handed lever-action '1887' cut-down; 6 shells; heavy knock-back.

175.name: Leaf Blower
175.effect: Hand-held blower that knocks players back with a steady air stream.

176.name: Liberating Minigun
176.effect: Stars-and-stripes Minigun; gentler horiz recoil; 150-round belt; no spin-up.

177.name: Mega Gun
177.effect: Beefed-up Minigun; huge recoil enables self-propulsion; 150-round belt.

178.name: Minigun
178.effect: Six-barrel rotary; 150-round belt; huge recoil; zero spin-up.

183.name: Taser Minigun
183.effect: Rapid-fire stun cannon; 150 taser rounds; brief paralysis on hit.

179.name: Missile Launcher
179.effect: Ten-shot launcher; slow missiles ricochet ~0.6 s before arming; good splash, low self-dmg.

181.name: Smoke Rocket Launcher
181.effect: Single-shot tube; rockets leave thick smoke on impact; direct hits hurt, splash obscures.

182.name: Rocket Launcher
182.effect: Bazooka-style; 10-rocket mag; decent splash, high knock-back, slow reload.

203.name: MGL
203.effect: Milkor-style 6-shot grenade revolver; medium arc; ~1.4 s timed detonation.

217.name: Browning M2
217.effect: Ma Deuce HMG; 500-round belt; 0.07 s ROF; devastating but hard to tame.

218.name: M1918 BAR
218.effect: 30-round light MG; slower ROF, very accurate once tamed; great suppression.

219.name: M8
219.effect: Sci-fi LMG; fire-rate ramps up as you hold trigger (up to ~4× base); 150-round drum.

220.name: MG-42
220.effect: WWII classic; blistering 0.05 s ROF; 80-round belt; vicious recoil.

221.name: Blinding Light
221.effect: Slow orb projecting a dazzling beam that whites out vision.

222.name: Gravity Field
222.effect: Large zero-G cylinder; players float upward until exiting.

223.name: Gust
223.effect: Blast of wind that throws enemies ~50 m and ragdolls.

224.name: Healing Aura
224.effect: Stationary bubble; 3 pulses healing ~30% max HP each.

225.name: Speed Aura
225.effect: Bubble granting >2× move speed for ~4 s.

226.name: Summon Rock
226.effect: Calls a giant boulder 0.75 s after impact to crush foes.

227.name: Teleport
227.effect: Blink to where the bolt lands for surprise flanks/rotates.

228.name: Track
228.effect: Red orb snakes to nearest enemy, leaving a trail to follow.

229.name: Fireball
229.effect: Spawns a mini Fire Grenade on impact.

230.name: Ice Bolt
230.effect: Frost aura on impact; slows and chips like Snow Grenade.

231.name: Magic Missile
231.effect: Shotgun of erratic purple bolts that home loosely.

232.name: Mirage
232.effect: Spawns several wandering clones of you.

233.name: Orb of Sight
233.effect: Remote-view sphere for scouting around corners.

234.name: Reveal
234.effect: Marks silhouettes through walls in a large radius.

235.name: Shockwave
235.effect: Concussive blast that ragdolls and launches in front.

236.name: Summon Tree
236.effect: Fires a hurtling tree; long-range dash + heavy impact dmg.

187.name: Big Healing Grenade
187.effect: Large bubble healing ~5 HP/s for 10 s; roof/street sized.

188.name: Black Hole Grenade
188.effect: After 2.25 s, spawns singularity pulling for 6 s; minor dmg.

189.name: Bombardment Grenade
189.effect: Splits to 14 flares; each calls 3 mini air-strikes over 2 s.

190.name: Bouncy Grenade
190.effect: Bounces ~8 s, exploding on each bounce up to ~70 dmg.

191.name: Cage Grenade
191.effect: Instant metal cage traps for ~12 s; bars block movement.

192.name: Taser Cage Grenade
192.effect: Cage with electrified bars that stun on touch.

193.name: Cluster Grenade
193.effect: After 3 s splits into 8 child grenades; quicker, smaller blasts.

194.name: Cluster Dummy Grenade
194.effect: After 2 s spawns 8 dummies acting as loud decoys for 20 s.

195.name: Dummy Grenade
195.effect: Spawns one mannequin with an AK/SCAR for ~20 s.

196.name: Fire Grenade
196.effect: Magma bubble burns 3–36 dmg/s over 10 s; ignores walls.

197.name: Grenade
197.effect: Standard frag; 3 s fuse; ~150 centre dmg; medium radius.

198.name: Healing Grenade
198.effect: 16-unit sphere healing 5 HP/s for 10 s; stacks with others.

199.name: Implosion Grenade
199.effect: Inward pull; ragdolls toward centre; mild damage.

200g.name: Knockback Grenade
200g.effect: 1 s fuse; blasts outward up to ~15 m; up to ~10 dmg.

201.name: Big Knockback Grenade
201.effect: Oversized KB with much larger radius and fling.

202.name: Launch Pad Grenade
202.effect: Plants trampoline with two bounces; second bounce higher.

204.name: Orbital Taser Grenade
204.effect: Marks a zone then rains taser lightning; repeated stuns.

205.name: Orbital Strike Grenade
205.effect: Targeting dome; ~10 s later a colossal blast nukes area.

206.name: Poof Grenade
206.effect: Confetti puff; harmless gag or fake-out.

207.name: Shield Grenade
207.effect: One-way bullet shield for 10 s; you shoot out, not in.

208.name: Smoke Grenade
208.effect: Thick smoke wall after 1 s lasting ~25 s; no damage cut.

209.name: Snow Storm Grenade
209.effect: Blizzard bubble slows and deals ~1–2 dmg/s for 10 s.

211g.name: Taser Splinter Grenade
211g.effect: Splinter pattern but each shard stuns.

212g.name: Flash (Stun) Grenade
212g.effect: Blinds/deafens up to 7 s; stackable effects.

214.name: Dynamite
214.effect: 6 s fuse; massive blast & vehicle damage.

215.name: Volley Grenade
215.effect: Pops, then rains a tight cone of arrows that one-shot beneath.

216.name: Wall Grenade
216.effect: Erects a tall climbable wall / mini-tower for cover & peek.

238.name: Ballistic Shield
238.effect: Tall riot shield blocking most bullets; bash staggers.

239.name: Triple Ballistic Shield
239.effect: Three linked shields protect flanks; back exposed.

240.name: Taser Ballistic Shield
240.effect: Ballistic Shield whose bash shocks for a brief stun.

241.name: Black Katana
241.effect: Two-handed; lunges forward per swing; 78-dmg slices.

242.name: Baton
242.effect: Side-handle baton with rapid spin attack.

243.name: Boxing Glove
243.effect: Pair of gloves; ~26-dmg quick jabs; comic thwack.

244.name: Cleaver
244.effect: Butcher’s blade; up to 3 swings per second; fast decaps.

245.name: Crowbar
245.effect: Light bar; 0.6 s swing; 3 torso or 2 head hits to down.

247.name: Taser Crusader Sword
247.effect: Crusader blade that stuns ~4 s instead of slicing.

248.name: Fish
248.effect: Floppy fish club; ragdoll slaps for humiliation kills.

249.name: Taser Fish
249.effect: Fish but a zapper: hit drops foes flailing ~4 s.

250.name: Holy Sword
250.effect: Glowing orange blade; one-hit chest/head; throw calls spectral sword.

251.name: Inflatable Hammer
251.effect: Squeaky toy hammer; fast swings; hilarious impact sound.

252.name: Jarl Axe
252.effect: Dane axe; slow, far reach; two-hit body kills; big knock-back.

253.name: Taser Jarl Axe
253.effect: Axe variant that stuns; pin then swap to finish.

254.name: Katana
254.effect: Heavy two-hander; any head hit is instant kill; dive-slash in air.

255.name: Knife
255.effect: Tiny blade; 0.3 s swing; best dual-wielded for quick takedowns.

256.name: Rapier
256.effect: Quick thrusts; right-click lunge for surprise pokes.

257.name: Riot Shield
257.effect: Compact shield blocking small-arms; mobile bullet soak.

258.name: Sabre
258.effect: Cavalry blade; opening swing is a downward head-cleaver.

259.name: Pan
259.effect: Cast-iron pan; slow but a single head bonk eliminates.

260.name: Medieval Shield
260.effect: Round shield; negates most arrows/bullets; bash aside.

261.name: Shovel
261.effect: Spade; 36 dmg; medium swing; decent reach; satisfying clang.

262.name: Viking Axe
262.effect: One-handed bearded axe; two body hits or one head to finish.

263.name: Weights
263.effect: Eight-plate barbell; battering ram with 'Get Ript' taunt.
